Quickstrike:




Quickstrike trailed Shredder to the threshold of the room he was in. He 
turned the opposite way of him, and shouted, with much pride as he could, "I 
was about to do that!"

He went off, towards the CR room. He paused at the entrance of the room. 
Every time he went here, he thought of how much he missed using the CR 
tanks. Using the chambers made him feel like a Maximal. As much as he could, 
he dismissed that thought and went to a unoccupied chamber. He opened it and 
stepped inside. It closed behind him.
